description:
Remove dirt and stains from your rain jackets and pants while revitalizing their breathability and Durable Water Repellency (DWR). Tech Wash is recommended for routine washing and as a pre-wash before applying Nikwax TX-Direct or other waterproof finish restorers.

  • Tech Wash leaves no detergent residue, so it won't degrade DWR finishes
  • Safe for waterproof-breathable fabrics including GORE-TEX® and eVent®
  • Water-based formula is biodegradable
  • Use in either top-loading or front-loading washing machines, or pre-treat stains with a small amount of Tech Wash on a sponge
  • For top-loading machines, use 150ml of Tech Wash for up to 3 garments and 250ml for 4-6 garments. For front-loading machines use 100ml of Tech Wash for up to 2 garments
name: Nikwax Tech Wash Cleaner Bulk
